comment._content: It could be a photo at a younger, slimmer time than nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/literature/laureates/1912/hau... or www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/257058/Gerhart-Hauptmann Gerhart Hauptmann was 50 when he got the Nobel in 1912. comment.author: 82195171@N00
comment._content: He looks like Gerhart Hauptmann, if you compare this photo to the images on Wikimedia. The first one there seams to be a copy of this photo.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: I agree that the Wikimedia collection of images does support this identification. The source for the Wikimedia copy of this picture appears to be a 1905 Polish book of Polish literature. So that would account for the fact that he looks younger than 50 in this photo -- he was no older than 43. The book is by Wilhelm Feldman (1868-1919), '''Współczesna literatura polska'' (Contemporary Polish literature, 1905). LoC has a later edition at lccn.loc.gov/76525697.
